message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with change detection in pairs of images using a deep neural network with a DAG topology. This involves learning patterns of change from image-level labeled training data and incorporating local differences and context with dense connections between individual pixels. The paper also uses a constrained mean-field algorithm to estimate pixel-level labels and update the parameters of the CNN in an iterative EM framework. Given these details, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is computer vision (cs.CV), followed by machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Multimedia (cs.MM) and information retrieval (cs.IR) are also possible sub-categories, given the focus on image analysis and pattern recognition.
